settings.heading: The origin and the vision
settings.description: Figlio was conceived in 2019 from a 40 year evolution of a family's experience curating, designing and making fine Italian jewellery. Founded from the very beginning with a forward thinking approach to creating timeless jewellery pieces to be worn everyday and become stylistic bedrocks to people's wardrobes.

settings.heading: A Man-Technology balance
settings.description: Our collections are meticulously designed, planned, created and finished using a combination of traditional methodology and innnovative technology to realize Figlio jewellery. Ideas always come from a pencil and a blank sheet of paper, then they take shape thanks to CADdesign and the use of the most advanced incision and welding laser technology during the production. Advanced technology assists those who everyday, with expertise and passion, take care of every single detail of Figlio jewellery.

settings.heading: An Italian story - made in Italy
settings.description: Figlio celebrates the excellence of Made in Italy through our support and celebration of Italian craftsmanship, an homage to artisanal savoir-faire and the continuous implementation of exceptional materials.
